findings.title: Owner can burn tokens of another account
findings.description: The Owner role has the ability to call the setFrozen() function of FreezingToken, allowing them to restrict token transfer for other accounts.

findings.title: 정보의 호선입니라음 FreezingToken#transferFrom() 세붕
findings.description: The frozen address can still transfer tokens using the FreezingToken#transferFrom() function, bypassing the freezing mechanism.

findings.title: Owner can restrict token transfer to other accounts
findings.description: The Owner role has the capability to call the setFrozen() function of FreezingToken, which allows them to restrict token transfers to other accounts.

findings.title: 조레에으 가 기귈
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks an Approval event, making it difficult to track changes and function calls in real-time.
